page.title: 16Home Life
page.content: I usually get up at 6.30a.m.and then I get a book and read it for half an hour.Then I play on my computer which is a Sinclair ZX Spectrum 48K. My cottage is 107 years old.It looks old on the outside but is modern inside.When I turn on the television set I turn to channel three which is T.S.W - Today South West usually T.V a.m the early morning breakfast show. For breakfast I have fried egg,baked beans,sausage,bacon,fried potatoe and fried bread.After breakfast I have to do the washing up which I don't mind. On Saturdays I go to town which is called Truro.Mum takes me in her Ford Escort.I usually go in Smiths,the library,Tesco and Boots.At 12.30 I buy a Cornish pasty which is pastry that is full of potatoe,turnip,onion and pieces of beef.I enjoy watching television in the evening.
